Text: RE New Years EveHave fun in TurkeyI hear once you get past the smell the chicks are really hot there To clarify the total price this year is and tuxedos are not required TAP Original Message From Scott Naquin mailto Sent Monday October AM To Tommy Porteous Ross Berthelot Cc Subject Re New Years Eve I think I will be visiting Rhett in Turkey this year for New Years It is a camoflouge theme and they will be serving MREs buffet style Rhett will be the guest of honor since he is the oldest peice of shit still in the gaurd Let me know who is in Naquin I am out for Chateau Porteous I would rather have a terrible time like I always do for New Years without the plus tuxedo overhead Tommy Porteous wrote Are any of you interested in doing New Years Eve at Chateau this year For those of you who have no idea what I am talking about the country club my parents belong to throws a big new years party every year The price ranges from per couple and includes the following buffet style dinner OPEN BAR four different bands champagne at midnight buffet style breakfast and party favors Each year there is a theme by which the place is decorated they always do a good job on this It is black tie optional or nice dark suit in the alternative THE CATCH TO ALL OF THIS IS MONEY IS DUE THIS WEDNESDAY FOR EARLY RESERVATIONSAFTER THIS WEDNESDAY IT IS A FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS AND YOU ARE SEATED UPON AVAILABILITY PLEASE LET ME KNOW ASAP IF THIS IS SOMETHING YOU ARE INTERESTED INIF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS GIVE ME A CALL AT or Timmy at TAP Original Message From Ross Berthelot mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Scott Naquin Cc Tommy Porteous Subject RE THE OFFICIAL SNOW REPORT Thats the type oshit I beez talkin bout That shit was fly dawg Nice one Original Message From Scott Naquin mailto Sent Thursday October AM To COREY ROBICHEAUX Cc Subject Re THE OFFICIAL SNOW REPORT Sorry Roby Let me make myself more clear for you to understand Yo my nigga me and my ice are in for da ski ski in da Rocks Me and my boyz will be in full effect Fill me in on when we will be going to C to the isa O to the iso and let me know how much bling bling I will need Cuz I got hos in dat area code Naquin COREY ROBICHEAUX wrote Good call Ross CjRob wants to know why also From To Scott Naquin CC Clint Eilbeck Myers Namie Myers Namie Denis Naquin Scott Naquin Tommy Porteous COREY ROBICHEAUX Cypress Baton Rouge Tanya Flynn Mike Gooch Bernard Guste Clay Hufft Matt Lenhart Cypress Litigation Ross Berthelot Ross Berthelot Chris Bourgeois Scott Dehart don edgerton Subject Re THE OFFICIAL SNOW REPORT Date Wed Oct Naq why do you refer to yourself in the rd person Jimmy likes ElayneJimmy thinks Elayne is allright Ross F Berthelot Underwriter Commercial Real Estate Ph Fax Scott Naquin on AM To Clint Eilbeck Myers Namie Myers Namie Denis Naquin Scott Naquin Tommy Porteous COREY ROBICHEAUX Cypress Baton Rouge Tanya Flynn Mike Gooch Bernard Guste Clay Hufft Matt Lenhart Cypress Litigation Ross Berthelot Ross Berthelot Chris Bourgeois Scott Dehart don edgerton cc Subject Re THE OFFICIAL SNOW REPORT Naquin is in if that is the actual dealClint did Malboro promise you this deal if you would keep smoking Props on the last email by the way that shit was good Give me the details as to when we need the first wave of cash Who is going without dates because I dont want to be stuck roasting marshmellows and snuggling in front the fireplace Naquin Clint Eilbeck wrote This is the Official Snowking Report for the Year How bout KeystoneVailBreckenridgeBeaver Creek all in one trip for the Amazing Price of Yes that is correct No Bullshit Listen Up This includes round trip tickets from NO to Denver Days Nights in a Condo in Keystone Either BR Bath or BR Bath w a fold out Includes minivan since Keystone is approximately miles from the Denver Airport Lift tickets for Days at the locations mentioned above Sorry only days out of can be at Vail or Beaver Creek Dates Jan th ThursMon If you act now they will also provide free snowjobs They also said if you ride a Harley Sportster all the way from BRthey will just give the trip away I asked about pets Dogs have to sleep outside Sorry They have plenty of ski runs One double black diamond goes through the nig part of town I suggest going w cjrob through this treacherous run and dont slow down on the flat areas Another goes straight to Oz we all know who will be hitting this green run in his Pink bib and jacket They also have a married couple run no further comments on this one Ill be on the bunny slopes checking out the MILFS and the beginners I hope to give a few lessons Anyway who has questions or comments CE Dont forget your swim trunks Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals message truncated Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals
